name: releaseVassal
rulesOne: If you have a Province with a town on it, you may release a Principality as your 'vassal'; replace your control marker with a Principality one. Place 2 influence on this Principality; you start its ally. Other Players may influence this Principality, and you may not retake this Principality except through war.

name: giftProvince
rulesOne: You may gift non-town provinces to Principalities if the provinces are adjacent to the Principality and the same religion as the Principality. Gain 1 Diplomatic Influence per gifted province with that Principality.

name: joinLeague
rulesOne: Players saved by Faith and Works may join the Catholic League. They lose 1 Diplomatic Influence from each Protestant Principality they have influence with. Players saved by Faith Alone may join the Evangelical League. They lose 1 Diplomatic Influence from each Catholic Principality they have influence with. Players not saved by Faith Alone or by Faith and Works may join either League and lose no Diplomatic Influence upon Joining a League. Players cannot change or leave Leagues.

name: provideAssistance
rulesOne: Players may pay Gold (to the bank) for Diplomatic Influence at a rate of 1:1.

name: influencePrince
rulesOne: You may place Diplomatic Influence on any Principalities of your choice. To ally a Principality, you must have at least as much Diplomatic Influence as the Principality has provinces, and more Diplomatic Influence than any other Player. You may ally a Principality regardless of the religion it follows.

name: convertReligions
rulesOne: If you are not a Foreign Power, lose all Faith, Saints, and/or Reformation Points of the opposing religion. Change the religion of your capital to your new religion. The is the only way your capital ever converts.

name: spreadFaith
rulesOne: You must be Protestant or a post Council of Trent Catholic to Spread the Faith. Roll all of your Faith dice. Earn 1 Saint or Reformation Point for each Cross or Crucifix (1-3) you roll. In Initiative Order, place all of your successful dice on provinces of your choice, defensively or offensively within their own territory, in a neighboring (adjacent) player-controlled non-capital province, or on a neighboring or allied Principality (but not a neighbor of an ally). See the Spread the Faith Rules for resolving Faith dice.

name: churchAbuses
rulesOne: If you are Catholic and the Council of Trent has not concluded, convert every two Faith into a Saint. Extra Faith is lost.

name: becomeForeignPower
rulesOne: You may become a Foreign Power if you have no provinces or if you have 5 Imperial Power or less during Round 1-3 or you have 15 Imperial Power or less during Round 4-6.
rulesTwo: Choose a Foreign Power hex and place it on the edge of the map. Replace your old province hex with a random Principality. Your Foreign Power is same Religion as your old Principality. Discard all saved and placed Influence but keep every other Influence discarded.
rulesThree: Every round, set your Imperial Power to the round number multiplied by four minus the total value of 2D6. Gain Imperial Power from Provinces gained as normal. You cannot lose your last province.

name: catholicReformation
rulesOne: Gain 2 Faith if you are Catholic and the Council of Trent has concluded.

name: saleOfIndulgences
rulesOne: Gain 1 Gold if you are Catholic and the Council of Trent has not concluded.

name: intercession
rulesOne: Gain 1 Faith per 5 Saints if you are Catholic.

name: keepTheFaith
rulesOne: Earn a Faith cube of your faith based on the round number and your total Saints.

name: downWithTheWhore
displayName: Down with the Whore of Babylon
rulesOne: Gain 3 Faith if you are Protestant and it's Round 1-3.

name: theJesuitsStrikeBack
rulesOne: Gain 1 Faith if you are Protestant and it's Round 4-6.

name: zeal
rulesOne: Gain 4 Faith if you are Saved.

name: imperialSanction
rulesOne: Gain 1 Faith if you are the Emperor or follow the Emperor's religion.

name: churchPatronage
rulesOne: Convert 1 Gold into 2 Faith as many times as you want.

name: changeDoctrine
rulesOne: Change your Military Doctrine by moving your cube.

name: declareWar
rulesOne: If you are a German Prince player or a Foreign Power player with a province in the Empire, declare war on a player or a prince that has not been declared war on this round. If you declare war on a prince, remove all Influence you have with them.

name: declareReligiousWar
rulesOne: If there is no existing Religious War, you are saved, and in a league, declare war against a prince or elector following a heretical religion. Become the Restorer of the Faith (ROTF).
